description: This Dart source file defines the application's routing logic, including route names, route map, route generation with argument handling, route arguments class, and placeholder widget implementations for a Flutter app's navigation system.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A centralized, typed route registry for the app, providing route names, route map, and route generation logic, including argument validation and placeholders.

classes.name: RecipeDetailArgs
classes.description: A simple data class for passing arguments to the recipe detail route, optionally including a recipe ID or a Recipe object.

classes.name: _HomePlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder widget simulating the home screen.

classes.name: _SearchPlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the search screen.

classes.name: _FavoritesPlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the favorites screen.

classes.name: _DetailPlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the recipe detail screen, displaying recipe title or ID.

classes.name: _InvalidArgsPlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder widget shown when route arguments are invalid or missing.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Returns a map of route names to widget builders for core screens.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Handles routes requiring arguments, specifically '/detail', validating argument type and providing fallback error page.
